div.head: 諸瘡中風
div.div: wind stroke via all possible sores

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: wind stroke via all possible sores

sense.def: Alternative Names po shang feng zhong 破傷風腫 , wound wind with swelling; sun chuang zhong feng 損瘡 中風 , wind stroke via wounds and sores; po shang feng shui du 破傷風水毒 , wound wind with water poisoning; ding chuang zhong feng 疔瘡中風， wind stroke via pin-illness sores. Pathological Condition of swelling and pain brought about by cold, wind, and moisture having entered the human body through an open wound. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29 has a recipe: 備急 療諸瘡中風寒水露腫痛 , “To promptly cure wind stroke via all possible sores , with swelling and pain brought about by cold water and dew”.
